title: c10d occasional EINTR
body_html:
Using c10d, I occasionally see

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::system_error'
  what():  Interrupted system call

on rank 0 process, even when the process doesn't call any collective. The collectives the ranks call are: one init_process_group, one allreduce, and one gather. Error is thrown after those calls are already finished. This is NCCL backend.

body:
Using c10d, I occasionally see
```
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::system_error'
  what():  Interrupted system call
```
on rank 0 process, even when the process **doesn't call any** collective. The collectives the ranks call are: one `init_process_group`, one `allreduce`, and one `gather`. Error is thrown after those calls are already finished. This is NCCL backend.
